apiAccessToken.description: API token to use for authentication with the server

apiUrl.description: URL of the ODF-compatible API server that will execute requests

blocksStride.description: Number of blocks to examine per one getLogs RPC request when catching up

chainId.description: ID of the chain used during signing to prevent replay attacks

httpAddress.description: Interface to listen for HTTP admin traffic on

httpPort.description: Port to listen for HTTP admin traffic on

ignoreConsumers.description:
Consumer addresses to ignore requests from (use as a disaster recovery
mechanism only)

ignoreRequests.description:
Request IDs that provider should skip over (use as a disaster recovery
mechanism only)

loopIdleTime.description: Time to sleep while waiting for new blocks

oracleContractAddress.description: Address of the oracle contract to read logs from

providerAddress.description: Address of this provider's account to use when submitting transactions

providerPrivateKey.description: Private key of the provider to use when signing transactions.

scanFromBlock.description:
Block number to start scanning from on startup (precedence:
scan_from_block, scan_last_blocks, scan_last_blocks_period)

scanLastBlocks.description:
Number of last blocks to scan on startup (precedence: scan_from_block,
scan_last_blocks, scan_last_blocks_period)

scanLastBlocksPeriod.description:
Time period in which blocks will be scanned on startup (precedence:
scan_from_block, scan_last_blocks, scan_last_blocks_period)

transactionConfirmations.description: Number of confirmations to await before considering transaction included
